text.text_translated: In the last 200 years, technology and health got better. So, fewer children died young. The number of people grew very fast. These big families had more children. These children lived to become adults and had their own children. But in the 1960s, more people could get contraception. Contraception is something people use to stop having babies. So, the average number of babies for each woman went down. The number went from six to only two.
